title: Applied fix for issue 1:
message:
Applied fix for issue 1:
http://intrawiki.atcomputing.nl/wiki/index.php/Refcard#Issues

Added <supports-screens android:xlargeScreens="true" /> to prevent
android from providing user with zoom option.
Added special fontsizes for xlarge screens.
Raised target to android-11 in project.properties to make Eclipse
happy regarding the <supports-screens android:xlargeScreens="true" />
option in the AndroidManifest.xml file. Minimum required SDK version
is still 7.
